00031 PointCloudAccumulatorIdAware::PointCloudAccumulatorIdAware(SceneGraphFacade* facadeHandle, unsigned int referenceNodeId) : PointCloudAccumulator(Node::NodePtr()) {
00032         assert(facadeHandle != 0);
00033         this->facadeHandle = facadeHandle;
00034         this->referenceNodeId = referenceNodeId;
00035 }
00036 
00037 PointCloudAccumulatorIdAware::~PointCloudAccumulatorIdAware() {
00038         facadeHandle = 0; //we do not delete, as we are not the owner
00039 }
00040 
00041 IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr PointCloudAccumulatorIdAware::doGetTransformFromReferenceToPointCloud(GeometricNode* node) {
00042         IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr transformFromReferenceToPointCloud;
00043 
00044         if(!facadeHandle->getTransformForNode(node->getId(), referenceNodeId, TimeStamp(), transformFromReferenceToPointCloud)) {
00045                 LOG(ERROR) << "PointCloudAccumulatorIdAware: Cannot find appropriate transfrom. Returning identity.";
00046 
00047                 IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr identity(new HomogeneousMatrix44());
00048                 transformFromReferenceToPointCloud = identity;
00049         }
00050 
00051         return transformFromReferenceToPointCloud;
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 }
00056 
00057 }
